workflows.name: form-to-google-sheet-email-ack
workflows.description: Requires Google Sheets and Gmail credentials

secrets_needed.GOOGLE_SHEETS_CREDENTIAL_ID: n8n Google Sheets OAuth credential ID

setup_instructions: 1. Connect your Google account to n8n (Google Sheets OAuth2)
2. Connect your Gmail account to n8n (Gmail OAuth2)
3. Create a Google Sheet for form data storage
4. Note the sheet ID from the URL: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/{SHEET_ID}/edit
5. Copy workflow.json.template to workflow.json and replace placeholders with your actual IDs
